description:
Galko, Otako, and Ojou are at the water park.
Otako hands Galko a razor believing that her armpit hair is shaggy because she forgot to shave them. Galko angrily says she never lets them get shaggy and shows them her smooth armpits.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: C’est vrai qu’il y avait des mecs, à la piscine ?
Is It True About the Boy at the Pool?
هل هذا صحيح عن الولد في المسبح؟
プールと少年って本当ですか?
